HCaptchaProxy.description: Proxy to use for outbound PHP web requests to hCaptcha servers

HCaptchaSiteKey.description: Sitekey from hCaptcha (requires creating an account)

HCaptchaSecretKey.description: Secret key from hCaptcha (requires creating an account)

HCaptchaSendRemoteIP.description: Whether to send the client's IP address to hCaptcha
